r.s: PHP Bindings for the Subversion Revision control system.
r.d: Bindings for the Subversion revision control system, providing a method for manipulating a working copy or repository with PHP.
r.n:
Minor bug fix / feature release
Changes: #60583 - compile failing due to missing definition of svn_version_t in newer releases of libsvn #59976 (svn build fails on PHP5.4) #15505 - warning on errors ------ support for peg revisions in checkout, ls, log, blame, info, proplist, propget extra error checks in checkout - thanks to Hyung-Hwan Chung #22758 - support specifying revision in svn_copy (he dot chen at zte dot com dot cn) #23649 - allow deletion of properties by using NULL as value (patch by Jonas Zeiger) #22754 - add support for svn_delete #22100 - segfault on shutdown when using multiple repositories - patch by jimmy at velsoft
